projects.name: BLOG WEBSITE
projects.description: This project includes a simple blog website which has a homepage that displays all the blogs. The add blog page allows the user to enter the blog. All these blogs are stored in MongoDB.

projects.name: STUDENT DATABASE PORTAL
projects.description: Utilizes HTML/CSS for front-end development. Employs Python Flask for back-end development, offers secure storage and retrieval of student details. Enables student login functionality, allows admin editing based on student registration numbers, serves as a foundational exploration of AWS infrastructure.

experiences.description: Utilizes HTML/CSS for front-end development and Python Flask for the back end. Provides secure storage and retrieval of student details. Enables student login and administrative editing based on registration numbers. Serves as a foundational exploration of AWS infrastructure and full-stack development.

Completed an 8-week virtual internship in Salesforce development. Gained skills in Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Process Automation, Flows & Security, Apex, Testing & Debugging, VS Code, CLI Setup, LWC, and API. Earned Super Badges including Apex Specialist, Process Automation Specialist, and Developer Super Set.

Conducted academic research on Object Detection in Autonomous Vehicles. Implemented YOLO V8 to enhance real-time recognition and safety features. Leveraged advanced computer vision techniques to optimize autonomous vehicle capabilities. Achieved mean Average Precision (mAP) scores of 61.6% (KAIST), 60.1% (UDACITY), and 64.4% (KITTI) using benchmark self-driving datasets during research on Object Detection in Autonomous Vehicles. Achieved the gold medal for exceptional research in AI/ML at SRM Universitys 8th Research Day for the project, Object Detection For Autonomous Vehicles Using YOLO.
